titleStmt.title: Fennes frutes vvhich vvorke is deuided into three seuerall parts; the first, a dialogue betweene fame and the scholler ... The second, intreateth of the lamentable ruines which attend on vvarre ... The third, that it is not requisite to deriue our pedegree from the vnfaithfull Troians, who were chiefe causes of their owne destruction: whereunto is added Hecubaes mishaps, discoursed by way of apparition.
titleStmt.author: Fenne, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By T. Orwin] for Richard Oliffe: and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
